title: EPISTOLA Edgon H. Margo
html:
EPISTOLA Edgon H. Margo

With a bow to Sterling Eisiminger and to William Gass, we have been inspired to collect a compilation of complimentary [sic] colors, viz.:

Sub Lime
Tickled Pink
Dead Beet
Freudian Gilt
Thanks Vermillion
Foreseeable Fuchsia
Original Cinnamon
Anti-Establish Mint
Shirley Temple Black
By Any Other Name Rose
How Now Cow Brown
In Them Thar Hills Gold
Hi-Ho Silver
Im-Peach

Any additional contributions to this project will be most welcome.

[Edgon H. Margo, Reseda, California]

[The violets of this attack are unprecedented, but I can tell that you're well red. This is a grayed idea, but I can't believe you're cerise! There's not much Lorne Green in it for us, butâ€”azure saying....]

Editor
